response.overview: The award-winning series, "The Kingfish," has been adapted into a feature film, "The Kingfish 2". The movie picks up where the first episode left off, with the three smart, savvy, and adventurous Philadelphia high schoolers-Bobby, Flip, and X-venturing into a tough section of North Philly on a quest to retrieve "something" mysterious. Along the way, they are confronted by ominous challenges and obstacles that they must overcome using their wit and a bit of luck. The trio find love interests, have a few laughs, engage in a fierce battle, and come face-to-face with the menacing Kingfish. The film is marked by its sharp wit, showcasing clever writing and lots of humor. It is free from sex, drugs, profanity, violence, or guns.
response.title: The Kingfish 2
